data.text: @sa_mum @rebeccazung And sick and vindictive. Strength to you my friend. Wait until the children are old enough to see for themselves maybe you can all have a super relationship again. It is never too late for love and forgiveness.
@ALETTAHA @rebeccazung Thanks, it’s beyond awful! Divorce is about the parents ending their relationship 😔 either parent using their children as bartering tools or punitively is unforgivable!

@sa_mum @rebeccazung I am so sorry. Such evil will not go unpunished. I think most parents on the receiving end of a psycho like that give up eventually or run out of money to fight it. Brad has been fighting it for 2,5 years. All he wants is his divorce and his kids. The 2 things she won't give him.

@ALETTAHA @rebeccazung It’s absolute abuse & yes everyone suffers, my kids don’t know their cousins at all 😔 they have met them twice in their lives & they were too little to remember! The ex has all the money, he kept going with lawyers & finally my sis in-law couldn’t afford to fight any more 😔

@sa_mum @rebeccazung #ParentalAlienation should officially be called child abuse and perpetrators should be jailed. Everyone suffers. The Aunts and Uncles, the Grandparents. Everyone. It is a sick phenomenon that Angie perfected. But it is proven kids turn against that parent in the end anyway.

@rebeccazung @ALETTAHA Wish we had judges like this here in SA! My sister inlaw has not been part of her son’s lives for 5 years due to their father turning them against her since they were 10 & 12, I haven’t seen my nephews since then either! It’s horrific that a parent can do that to their children!
